metadata.name: Power to Rewatch Memories
metadata.description:
If you could choose one super power, what would it be? Mine is…

✨ The Power to Rewatch Memories

If you could re-watch any of your memories dating back to childhood, to teenage years, or even adulthood, which memories would you go back and watch? Would it be the moments when you last fell in love, or when you had your first spiritual awakening, or even just to see a loved one who has passed on. If given these opportunities, we may potentially witness details that we didn't pick up on while in the moment. This power isn't meant to re-do/change these memories, only to rewatch, as each of these moments have been placed on our path for a reason, whether they are painful, joyful and/or life changing. Do you dare to rewatch these powerful memories? If so, be prepared to relive them again.
